name: PinkyMan v1
description:
"Its my first game, so im excited to do more, maybe with your donation i can create more lvls of Pinky Man, or another kind of game. Anyway i hope you enjoy - André Marques.

To play this game you have to collect all fruits colliding with then, use the keyboard arrows to move foward or backward and Space to Jump, also double space to double jump. 

( to run full screen and see all objects you must to click in the blue button right bellow in the right )

sincerely i hope you enjoy it. 

André Judá Marques
